definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: unknown & dub.) whence came gold, ´[[זׇהָב מֵא]] Je 10:9; ´[[כֶּֽתֶם א]] Da 10:5; so Thes 1Ki 10:18 [[זׇהָב מוּפָז]] ([[מוּפָז]] = ´[[מֵא]]); but LXX do/kimov, & 2Ch 9:17 [[טָהוֹר]], whence MV Klo make [[מוּפָז]] Hoph. Pt. fr. [[פזז]] q.v. Klo rds. [[אוֹפִיר]] (q.v.) for [[אוּפָז]] Je 10:9, Da 10:5, in view of [[כֶּתֶם אוֹפִיר]] Is 13:12.
